column2: Direct report to the VP who oversees the finance and accounting functions of the Group
To take particular responsibility for regular group level reporting, budgeting & forecasting, financial analysis and strategic planning.
To take the lead in the designing and implementing governance and risk management frameworks from strategic to operational levels.
To take the lead in initiating change management activities and significant involvement in ad hoc projects as required
To leadthe professional team to oversee system implementation, review policies and procedures, develop and review internal control systems to enhance good governance and to improve efficiency
To ensure internal controls are sufficient to maintain all levels of compliance, and to give recommendations for improvement and corrective measure where necessary.
Developing and maintaining good external relationships with auditors, bankers, solicitors, tax authorities and related government bodies for banking, taxation, customs and related issues.
Build and maintain a high performance finance team by providing strong leadership and guidance

To enhance management reporting including financial andaccounting, auditing, cost control, business performancebudgeting,cash flow, statutory reporting, and tax planning in a professional and timely manner.
Analyze financial performance of various profit centers and monitor their results against budget and KPIs
To provide professional advice and tax planning to top management
To collaborate with senior management to proactively understand the business needs and drive IT team for technology solutions to improve business efficiency

To qualify for this position the successful candidate will be a degree holder in finance or accounting, a qualified accountant, and preferably with professional qualification such as ACCA or CPA or the equivalent

Has to demonstrate successful experience gained from sizable organizations with a minimum of 10 years of relevant working experience in a leading finance role of which 5 years at managerial level in a fast paced and innovative environment
With the ability to manage people, motivate and drive change in an organization
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and the ability to collaborate with management at all levels
Proficiency in MS Suite, experience in system enhancement, and familiar with SAP ERP system will be an added advantage
Excellent analytical skills and problem solving skills, and able to work under pressure
Proficiency in English is required with Cambodian language or other Asian language a bonus

,Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.",Publish Date：Jan-28-2015,Closing Date：Feb-27-2015,"Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136"

-Excellent interpersonal communication skills.","SITC International Holdings Limited is a leading shipping and logistics enterprise in Asia headquartered in Hong Kong. Its business areas include container liner transportation, ship management, ship brokerage, international freight forwarding, LCL, project logistics, logistics distribution, customs declaration, warehousing, Container yard, wharf, shipping agency, bulk cargo and other fields.

As of December 31, 2021, the company operated a total of 96 container ships and 5 bulk carriers. Among them, there are 68 self-owned container ships; 74 routes are operated, and the network covers mainland China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Thailand, the Philippines, Cambodia, Indonesia, Singapore, Brunei, Malaysia, Bangladesh, Myanmar and Russia. 74 major ports in 16 countries and regions. According to Alphaliner's statistics, as of December 31, 2021, SITC ranked 16th among global container shipping companies in terms of shipping capacity; in 2021, the maritime container shipping volume exceeded 3.142 million TEUs (excluding empty containers).

Currently, SITC has built and operated depots in Qingdao, Shanghai, Ningbo, Tianjin, Dalian, Xiamen, Vietnam, Haiphong, Ho Chi Minh, Thailand, Bangkok, Laem Chabang, Thailand, Jakarta, Surabaya, Semarang, South Africa, and Johannesburg and Cape Town, South Africa. , Warehousing business logistics park. - Have  good understanding of all aspects of concrete production and extensive products and services
- Familiarize with QC/QA of concrete industry with the ability to lead the development of QC/QA standards and manual and its implementation.
- Have good knowledge of appropriate regulations pertaining to health, safety and the environment.
- Have strong interpersonal skill with the ability to communicate professionally with vendors and customers and managers and employees at all levels.

column2: Plan and implement various marketing projects and activities for assigned brand.
Implement marketing plans within allocated brand budget and provide feedback to marketing manager on the execution of approved plans/activities.
Monitor brand health performance, i.e. track throughput sales, and revise brand plans, as appropriate.

Maintain close collaboration with brand’s promotion agency, advertising agency, and other cross-functional groups to establish short- and long-term brand performance goals and ensure successful plan development and execution.

Work with relevant staff members to develop a comprehensive program to complement the activities of the sales teams and support the promotion of assigned brand(s); work with sales teams to identify, design and create selling tools.

Coordinate with relevant operational personnel, i.e. sales, corporate communications, purchasing, finance, packaging, warehouse, etc., on execution of promotion mechanics and logistics, to ensure minimum disruption to work-in-progress via timely briefings and orderly execution and management.
Coordinate the post-evaluation of marketing events and analyze available market and consumer research information and contribute to the development of the annual brand plan.
Perform detailed business performance analysis of responsible brand(s) as well as competitive products, summarize performance trends, identify key drivers, and formulate action plans, as appropriate.
University degree in Marketing, Business or a related field.
3 to 5 years of brand marketing experience with all exposure to all elements in the marketing mix.
Ability to identify or determine key priorities and brand needs.
Ability to translate marketing strategy into tactics and ideas into action.
Good command of spoken and written English
Good computer knowledge, Ms office applications and design software
Superior communication skills; excellent verbal and presentation skills.
Strong interpersonal skills with a focus on teamwork.
Ability to communicate and work with a variety of personalities.
Self-motivated and proactive professional.
Creative and an eye for detail.
Flexibility and adaptability.
Result-oriented and meeting datelines.

","iOS/Android Developer in Phnom Penh
We are looking for iOS/Android Developer in Phnom Penh.
Please try to apply for our opportunity. If you are interested in our team, please feel free to contact us!
We would like to release some appications to the world from Cambodia.
We are looking for challengers!
・Developing iOS or Android Application with our team.
・Writing high-quality software from given requirements and creative problem-solving through software solutions
・Our working day: from Mon to Fri and a half day of Sat.
Here are our company rules.
1. working time
You need to work from 8am to 5pm usually.
But, you can be late within 1 hour without contacting me.
If you will be late for more than 1 hour, please let me know.
Basically, please work for 8 hours(Saturday 4 hours).
For example, if you come to our office at 9 am, please work until 6pm.
2. break time
You have 1 hour lunch time.
If you want to take a break at working time, please feel free to take a break within 15mins around 3 times.
I don't mind if you take a break at 4 times or 5 times, but please don't take a break more than 6 times.
If you have to go out for more than 1 hour, please let me know.
3. concentration
If you want to concentrate developing and learn to watch movie, you can put on an earphone.
But, please take care of sound leaking.
Basically, If you produce results and improve your skill, I don't mind almost all.
I hope you can develop while relaxing.
4. Others
■Holiday:
Sunday, Saturday(a half),Cambodia national holidays
■Benefit
Overtime pay
Extra money
If the company has profit, we can pay the extra money.
■Salary
The range of salary is $300 ~ $500.
You can negotiate it according to experience.","- 1 years experience developing native iOS or Android applications using Objective C or JAVA.

","Top Reasons to Work with Us
1. We are changing the way people get fit by delivering live-streaming instructional content to the most technologically advanced indoor cycle.
2. We're both humbled and wildly-motivated by the incredible scope of the product we're building.
3. We're a small, fast-paced and growing team tackling huge new challenges every day.
What You Will Be Doing
- You will be working on the flagship experience that comes with every bike.
- Strong knowledge of data structures, Algorithms and designing for performance
- Android engineers will be working with live streaming technology and low latency video chat as well as bringing the social ecosystem to life on the Android platform.
- We're looking for engineers who are excited about the Android platform and obsessed with perfecting user experience and aesthetic.
,- 1+ years of Android development experience, and knowledge of:
- Android Development
- Android SDK
- REST
- KitKat
- Java
- XML
- HTTP
- paypal
- Bachelor degree in a technical field such as computer science, computer engineering or related field required. MS or other related advanced degree preferred.
- Strong object-oriented software development expertise, knowledge of Java language
- Experience with HTTP, JSON, Rest, XML
- Multi-Threading and memory management specific to mobile devices
- Understanding of caching mechanisms
- Preferred Experience with Android Security. Code obfuscation, secure storage, encryption
- Preferred Experience in payments integration and / or online ecommerce shopping and / or Payment gateways.
- Thrive working in a fast pace, start-up environment with constant learning
- Video Streaming experience is a plus!
What's In It for You
- Great Salary or rate if you prefer contracting!!
- Work with a fast-paced and growing team
So, if you are a Senior Android Developer with 3+ years of experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Email your resume in Word to: hr@borama.consulting

","1. Scope of working: Internal Financial Auditor is protects assets by planning and completing financial audits; identifying inadequate, inefficient, or ineffective internal controls; recommending improvements.
2.  Duties & Responsibilities:

-     Plans financial audits by understanding BOREY PENG HUOTH objectives, structure, policies, processes, internal controls, and external regulations; identifying risk areas; preparing audit scope and objectives; preparing audit programs.

-     Assesses compliance with financial regulations and controls by executing audit program steps; testing general ledger, account balances, balance sheets, income statements, and related financial statements; examining and analyzing records, reports, operating practices, and documentation.

-     Assesses risks and internal controls by identifying areas of non-compliance; evaluating manual and automated financial processes; identifying process weaknesses and inefficiencies and operational issues.

-     Improves protection by recommending changes in management monitoring, assessment, and motivational practices, in the internal control structure, and in operating processes; identifying root causes.
-     Protects BOREY PENG HUOTH's reputation by keeping information confidential.","3.   Qualification & Requirement:

-     Good Analyzing Information , Research Skills, Reporting Research Results
-     Good Verbal Communication
-     Attention to Detail, Objectivity

Full Time
Human Resource
Human Resource

column2: Report to the Human Resources & Administrative Department Head.
Work closely with the senior executives in developing HR and operational initiatives and strategies to meet the company’s growth plan and changing business needs.

Act as Business Partner to provide full range of professional HR services and advices including but not limited to manpower planning, recruitment, compensation and benefits, training and development, performance management and organization development.
Partner with various HR specialists and functional teams to champion HR initiatives for the implementation of people strategies, polices and best practices.
Formulate, implement and review human resources procedures and policies to ensure compliance of all stipulated legal requirements.
Evaluate effectiveness of training program, perform gap analysis, develop training curriculum as a training foundation to fulfill learning and development needs.
Perform other duties as assigned by the company.
Successful applicants will possess a minimum of 10 years’ experience in handling all-round human resources and administration functions of which 5 years or above at managerial level.
Degree holder with major in human resources management or related disciplines.
Previous experiences gained in sizeable organizations are definitely an advantage.
Possess exceptional interpersonal and communication skills and be adept at influencing stakeholders and employee relations.
Conversant with Employment Ordinance and other employment-related legislations
People-oriented,  proactive, resourceful, outgoing, self-motivated and a good team player
Strong sense of responsibility with good analytical skill, flexible and detail-minded
Excellent command of both spoken and written English, knowledge of other Asian languages is a plus.
Proficiency in MS Office applications and HRIS

column1: ,Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. ","1. Scope of working: Civil and Structural Engineering Manager provide technical support to civil engineers and civil engineering technologists. They assist in the research, design, construction, operation and maintenance of projects such as roads, buildings, and drainage systems.
2.   Duties & Responsibilities:
- help to estimate costs, prepare specifications for materials and carry out surveying and drafting
- prepare working drawings, plans and designs for construction work
- use computers to produce designs, detailed drawings and documentation
- help in programming the work and checking materials
- maintain close contact with construction workers and project managers
- check that finished works are within specifications, regulations and contract provisions
- inspect civil engineering works and organize and supervise maintenance and repair work.","3. Qualification & Requirement:
- A bachelor's degree/Master degree in Civil engineering
- 3 or more years of work experience of real estate/private Company.
- Computer literacy especially MS Office, MS Project, AutoCAD and 2D & 3D
- able to identify, analyses and solve technical problems
- good oral and written communication skills
- capable of accurate, detailed work
- aptitude for computing and design
- practical and creative
- able to work independently or as part of a team
- able to accept responsibility.
- BOQ

- Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm

","- ខេត្តក្រចេះ (ចំនួន​ 5នាក់​)​​​ស្រុក ស្នួល​(ចំនួន​ 5នាក់​)​​​ និង ខេត្តកំពង់ចាម ស្រុកអូរំាងឳ​​ (ចំនួន​ 3នាក់​)​​, ស្រុកចំការលើ (ចំនួន​ 4នាក់​)​​ ស្រុកជើងព្រៃ (ចំនួន​ 3នាក់​)​​
*** អត្ថ​ប្រ​យោជន៍​ដែល​ត្រូវ​ទទួល​បាន៖

សុក្រឹត​ ផ្តល់​ជូនប្រាក់​បៀ​វត្សខ្ពស់ ផ្អែក​លើ​ចំណេះ​ ​ជំនាញ និងប​ទ​ពិ​សោធន៍ ក្នុងអំឡុងពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទទួលបាន 150$/ខែ  ឡើងទៅ ។ ស្ថា​ប័ន​មាន​ផ្តល់​ជូន អត្ថ​ប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា ​ប្រាក់​ ​ខែ​ទី​១៣ ប្រាក់​លើក​ទឹក​ចិត្តប្រចាំខែ​។ ​ធា​នា​រ៉ាប់​រង​លើ​សុវត្ថិ​ភាព​ការ​ងារ ​ប្រាក់​ព្យាបាលជំងឺ​ ។","- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី12 ឡើងទៅ
- មានអត្តចរិតល្អ ឧ​ស្សា​ហ៍​ព្យា​យាម ស្មោះ​ត្រង់​​ ម៉ឹងម៉ាត់​​ សុភាព​រាប​សារ​ ​និងរួស​រាយ​រាក់​ទាក់
- មាន​ទំនាក់​ទំនង​ល្អ​ជា​មួយ​អ្នក​ដទៃ និង​អាច​ធ្វើ​ការ​ជា​ក្រុមបាន និងអាចទទួលយកការចាត់តាំងផ្លាស់ប្តូរតំបន់របស់សុក្រឹត
- តស៊ូ​ក្នុង​ការងារ និងចេះ​ជិះ​ម៉ូតូ​ស្ទាត់​ជំនាញ​ ហើយ​អាច​​ធ្វើ​ដំណើរ​តាម​តំបន់​​គោល​ដៅឆ្ងាយ​ៗបាន និង​មាន​ការ​ទទួល​ខុស​ត្រូវ​ខ្ពស់
- ត្រូវ​មាន​កម្ពស់​ចាប់​ពី ១,៦៨ម ឡើង​ទៅ និង ត្រូវ​មាន​ម៉ូតូ​ប្រើ​ប្រាស់ផ្ទាល់​ខ្លួន ( Honda Dream ចាប់ពីសេរី2009 ឡើង )។
*** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ
- បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំនាប់អារម្មណ៍សូម ​ទំនាក់​ទំនង​និង​ដាក់CVដោយភ្ជាប់ មកជាមួយរូបថត៤X៦ចំនួន១សន្លឹក បិទភ្ជាប់នឹងប្រវត្តិរូប ប័ណ្ណគ្រួសារ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ​  សញ្ញាប័ត្រថតចំលងបញ្ជាក់ពីសាលាខេត្ត-ក្រុង

និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ យកមកដាក់​នៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាល សុក្រឹត ដែលមានអាស័យដ្ឋាន វិឡាផ្ទះលេខ22និង24​  ផ្លូវលេខ1A ​​( បុរីពិភពថ្មីជិតស្ថានីយ៍ទូរទស្សន៍ អាស៊ីអាគ្នេយ៍) សង្កាត់​ទឹកថ្លា ខណ្ឌ​​សែនសុខ ​រាជ​ធានី​ភ្នំ​ពេញ។

លក់សេវាអិនធឺណែតដល់អតិថិជន។
ផ្ដល់ជាមតិយោបល់ ប្រឹក្សា អំពីសេវាអិនធឺណែតរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដល់អតិថិជន។
ធ្វើការជម្រុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តឱ្យអតិថិជនមកប្រើប្រាស់សេវាអិនធឺណែត។
ស្វែងរកនូវពត៌មាន និង វិធីសាស្ត្រយ៉ាងណាក្នុងការទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនសក្ដានុពល។
ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន និង បំពេញសំណុំបែបបទលើកិច្ចសន្យាប្រើប្រាស់អិនធឺណែត នៅពេលដែលគាត់សម្រេចចិត្តប្រើប្រាស់។
តម្រូវកាការងារ
មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ មានយានជំនិះផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន ស្គាល់ផ្លូវនៅទីក្រុងភ្នំពេញបានល្អ។
មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង មានគំនិតក្នុងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម និងស្រលាញ់ការងាជាអ្នកលក់ និងផ្នែកទីផ្សា មានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។
ផ្ដល់អទិភាពសម្រាប់អ្នកដែលកំពុងសិក្សានៅមហាវិទ្យាល័យ និងមានចំណេះដឹងខ្លះៗទាក់ទងនឹងអិនធឺ  ណែត
អត្តប្រយោជន៍
ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្តន៍ខ្ពស់ ទទូលបានឱកាសក្នុងការពងឹ្រងសម្មតភាពកាងារ បទពិសោធន៍ ចំណេះដឹង ព្រមទាំងទទួលបានឱកាសបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាល

column2: ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្តល់សេវាអ៊ិនធឺណេត

column1: - ចំនួនបុគ្គលិកត្រូវការៈ 10នាក់
- ភេទៈ បុរស/នារី
- ទីតាំងៈ ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ
- រយៈពេលបុគ្គលិកធ្វើការៈ ពេញម៉ោង ឬក្រៅម៉ោង
ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ
- ត្រូវចេះស្វែងរកព័ត៌មាននិងមានវិធីសាស្រ្តយ៉ាងណាអាចទាក់ទាញបាន ភ្ញៀវសក្តានុពល។
- ចេះមានយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តក្នុងការចរចាទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនអោយប្រើប្រាស់សេវាកម្ម របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងបំពេញបែបបទលើ ទម្រង់កិច្ចសន្យារបស់អតិថិជន។
- ចេះផ្តល់ជាមតិយោបល់ ក៏ដូចជាពន្យល់អោយអតិថិជនបានយល់ពីសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន OPENNET​ កំពុងមាន។","- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
- មានចំនេះដឹងពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងបច្ចេកវិទ្យាផ្នែកព័តមាន និងអ៊ីធឺណេត
- មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកទទួលសេវាអតិថិជន
- មានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏ក្នុងការធ្វើអាជីវកម្ម
- មានភាពរហ័សរហួន និងចេះប្រែប្រួលតាមកាលៈទេសៈ
- មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ រូបសម្បត្តិសមរម្យ
- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់និងឧស្សាហ៏ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ
- ជាញឹកញាប់ត្រូវជួបនិងអតិថិជននៅខាងក្រៅ
- បេក្ខជនត្រូវមានបទពិសោធន៏និងចំនេះដឹងអំពីផ្នែកទីផ្សារ
- ផ្តល់អតិភាពចំពោះបេក្ខជនដែលមានបទពិសោធនៅក្នុងអាជីវកម្មធានារ៉ាប់រង, អចលនទ្រព្យ, បច្ចេកវិទ្យាទូរគមនាគមន៍។
អត្ថប្រយោជន៏បន្ថែមៈ
- ទទួលបានប្រាក់បៀវត្យសមរម្យ និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ផ្សេងៗបន្ថែមទៀត
- បរិស្ថានការងារល្អ
- មានឪកាសទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញផ្សេងៗ
- មានអត្ថប្រយោជន៏ផ្សេងៗបន្ថែមទៀតយោងតាមគោលការណ៏របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
ការទទួលពាក្យៈ
- បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យសូមទាក់ទងមកដោយ ផ្ទាល់នៅការិយាល័យកណ្តាលរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន OPENNET​​ ដោយមានអាស័យដ្នាននៅខាងក្រោមៈ
- ផ្ទៈលេខ 231 ផ្លូវឯករាជ សង្កាត់លេខ2 ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ។
***ចំណាំ ៖ បេក្ខជនត្រូវបញ្ចាក់ទីតាំងខាងលើរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនដែលខ្លួនដាក់ពាក្យអោយបានច្បាស់។

,Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.",Publish Date：Dec-17-2014,Closing Date：Jan-16-2015,"Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136"

- Presentation skills, Aptitude to understand the Business

- Responsible for the implementation of HR processes, policies and guidelines within the country
- Knowledge in labour law compliance, payroll
- Monitor and advice the Regional HR on HR metrics, local trends and changes in local legislation that could impact the organization
- Good in leadership, Management and high motivation
- Be a co-ordinator for e-learning and assist in scheduling on/off-site training to each individual staff as required
- Assist hiring managers with recruitment and the overall management of human resources
- Support team in resolving HR issues
- Work closely with GM (APLL)/Commercial Head (APL) and all business leaders of APL Cambodia","Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

","I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION

- To provide overall leadership and management for the area development program in accordance with relevant World Vision strategies (e.g. National and Secondary), policies (e.g. Transformational Development, Child Sponsorship) and frameworks (e.g. Learning through Evaluation with Accountability and Planning (LEAP))

- To effectively represent and model World Vision’s mission, vision, core values and identity through good relationships and networks with relevant internal and external stakeholders, including staff, community groups, local church, local leaders, government departments and other NGOs.
II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES

- Manage and support the Area Development Program (ADP) staff to ensure good individual and team performance in support of quality ministry and good stewardship, Facilitate effective teamwork, coordination and work planning between Transformational Development Facilitators (TDFs) and Project Coordinators in support of ministry objectives.

- Ensure that program and projects comply at all stages with World Vision International (WVI) standards for Design, Monitoring and Evaluation, as specified in the LEAP framework and associated guidelines Ensure that project priorities are based on community needs and reflect WV Cambodia’s three strategic themes: vulnerable children; empowered communities and transformed systems and structures.
- Ensure gender balance, Christian commitment, and child protections are integrated into planning and implementation of projects.

- Ensure monitoring system and tools are developed and used by Project Coordinators (PCs) & Transformational Development Facilitators (TDFs) to track the progress of project implementation, and to capture learning. Coordinate processes for Area Development Program (ADP) evaluation and Transformational Development Indicator (TDI) measurement

- Ensure compliance with sponsorship standards and integration of child sponsorship with development programming in accordance with Sponsorship and Transformational Development (TD) Policies, and sponsorship programming guidelines

- Coordinate with all staff and partners (especially Community-Based Organizations (CBOs)) to ensure and support project implementation that promotes sustainable, child-focused transformational development
,1. Fully able to embrace organizational values and possess a high level of commitment towards the mission of WVC.
2. Bachelor of Business Management or Rural Development.
3. Minimum 2 years of appropriate professional experience in management and leadership of a comparable community development program/project.
4. Experience in project and program design, implementation, monitoring, evaluation, and report writing.
5. Previous experience in advocacy and networking.
6. Christian commitment and maturity is an advantage.
7. Competent in written English communication and Computer literate; Microsoft Word and Excel.
8. Willingness to travel and stay overnight at project sites, sometimes in remote areas
INSTRUCTIONS
To apply for this position, visit our website and APPLY ONLINE. Complete the online Application Form or send your completed. Application Form, CV and Cover Letter to cam_recruitment@wvi.org
World Vision Cambodia will not accept hard copy applications.
Website: www.worldvision.org.kh Email to: cam_recruitment@wvi.org

","I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION

- Representative as technical, sharing projects information, lessons learned among other partners and stakeholders

,As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.
Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.
What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.
In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

-Team leaders are in charge of work groups.

-Team leaders must be effective, to ensure the success of the team.

+ Responsibilities :
- Responsible for physical installation, modification, testing and servicing of data/network communication equipment at Head
Office, Disaster & Recovery Site, Branches and Sub Branches including firewall, routers, switches, and ISP backbone.
- Prepare installation plan and on-going budget for Data Center maintenance including Fire Suppression (FM-200), Cooling System,
UPS and NetBotz Data Center Monitoring Appliance.
- Regularly support, maintenance and troubleshoot LAN, WAN and IT security in HQ, DR, and Branch/Sub branch office.
-Perform analysis of network security needs and contribute to design, integration, and installation of hardware and software.
-Perform analysis, troubleshoot and correct network problems remotely as well as on site
- Negotiate with providers (ISP) for new connection, relocation and termination.
-Setup and maintain proper documentation of deployment system.

- Participates in teamwork and supports colleagues
-To be proactive in responding to user issues and maintain “sense of urgency” at all time.
- To comply with all the company policies
- Monthly report all expense, relocation and termination of connections include incident report for downtime for each connection.
+ Requirements:
-Bachelor degree in Computer Science/Related field or higher
-At least 2 year experience in IT Network, Technical Support in Bank/MFI or ISP is preferred.
-At least 1 year experience with Mikrotik Router such as routing protocol (Static, Dynamic & Routing Rule), VPN Technologies using
IPSec, GRE, MPLS, EoIP , Bonding, QoS (Simple Queues, Queues Tree and Mangle), NAT, PAT, Static NAT (Port Forwarding), High Ability with VRRP, and Load Balancing technique.
-Strong understanding of Network Infrastructure for LAN, WAN, VPN and Firewall appliance including Cisco firewall and CheckPoint
firewall.
-Good understanding of Cisco switch L2, L3 is preferred.
-Good knowledge of system monitoring such as Solarwind, Cacti, Nagios, SmokePing, Syslog server and other monitor tools is
desirable.
-Sound knowledge of Unix and Windows 2008/2012, OS including Active Directory & DNS.
-Willing to work under pressure and travelling in provincial
-Good communication, facilitation and good interpersonal skills
-Good written and spoken English
-Prior experience with a 24/7 technical operational environment is highly desired

- Friendly, hard work, honestly, flexible and can work under the presure","Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

","2016年、プノンペンに日系の新しい病院がオープンします！
新病院では日本語通訳の方を募集しています。
意欲・能力のある方には、日本で研修を行うチャンスもあります。
ご応募お待ちしております。
New Japanese Hospital is opening in January 2016 !!

A system capable of providing high-standard medical services will be established through operations led by a team of Japanese doctors, nurses and relating medical professionals while providing training and working with Cambodian medical staff members.
We seek candidates to work in the new hospital. We are looking forward to meet candidates who have passion to improve new hospital together.
- There will be a training period prior to the opening.
- Allowance will be provided during the training period
- Training location: in Phnom Penh and in Japan(Tokyo)

・カンボジア／日本での研修に参加できる
・医療用語・医療知識を学ぶ意欲がある

- 2 years experience or upper in working in Japanese company
- Able to use basic computer skills (MS Office, Internet, Email)
- Communicate in English
- Can attend prior training in Cambodia and in Japan

",#NAME?,"- Bachelor degree in Computer Science or higher
- Experience developing business android applications, developing web applications, years’ experience of object-oriented software development,
- Knowledge of desktop and mobile web browsers
- Comfortable working through the entire stack from user interface through the systems levels
- Prototyper, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, AJAX and PHP is a plus
- Advance knowledge developing and debugging android","Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. ","Company Profile:
Our client which is a pork shop seller is currently seeking for Sales Leader.

- Reporting direct to Sales Supervisor
- Keeping up to date with products/services and competitors
- In some jobs you may also be involved with marketing
- Other task assign by Sales Supervisor

- Male or female
- From 20 ~ 30 years old
- Bachelor in related field is a plus

","Company Profile:
Our client which is formerly known as commercial Bank and from Singapore is currently seeking for high challenges, dynamic and rigorous candidate to challenge the position Credit Manager.
Responsibilities:
- Review and recommend the loan applications.
- Ensure the quality of the Bank’s lending portfolio conforms to the expectations set by Management.
- Make sound credit-based decisions based on quality analysis on a timely basis with accuracy of risk grades in line with the Bank credit principles and policy.
- Be proactive in credit structuring and suggest alternative ways to make credit proposal acceptable.

- Support counterparts in reviewing credit related returns and reports, monitoring and identifying customer credit risks and the deviations of management control from acceptable credit standards, new provisions and ensuring appropriate action is taken.
- Provide sound credit consultancy advice, coaching and training to counterparts in achieving business strategies.
- Advise on external and general business conditions in local area of responsibility, interpret their likely impact on lending assets or activities and recommend/implement appropriate initiatives.
- Ensure the accurateness of all reports related to Credit before submission to regulatory authorities and Management.
- All other duties and matters ancillary to the above that Management may require from time to time.
Requirements:
- Degree in Business or Economics.
- At least 4 years of practical experience in credit management.
- Strong commitment to work and able to manage multi tasks.
- Ready to work occasionally overtime and willing to travel to provinces.
- In-depth knowledge of the Cambodian banking industry.
-Good command in written and spoken English.
- Current working experience at supervisory level.
- Strong communications skills.
- Possess good leadership and management style.
- Attentive and devoted to deliver good quality works.
Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Saturday
- Holidays: Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary Range: $1200-$1800
- Other benefit plus","How to apply:

","- Formulate strategic goals, objectives, and activity plans for socio-economic services unit;
- Develop/ refine guideline procedure and methodology of socio-economic services, develop IEC tools and pilot test and roll-out initiatives;
- Work with technical assistant to develop business counseling, and social referral services to respond to the real problem of clients/partners;

- Build up capacity and provide ongoing technical support to Community Facilitators who are responsible for providing socio-economic services to clients/partners and community people at Chamroeun’s branch offices;
- Explore and develop partnership with aligned vision and mission development agencies and social enterprises and give clients/partners referral to the partnered agencies/enterprises;
- Monitor and evaluate the socio-economic service activities in all branches;
- Lead the implementation of projects (scholarship program, disaster recovery program,..) under Chamroeun Foundation Association (CFA); and
- Ensure timely submission of monthly activity report and annual report to supervisor.
,- Be a Cambodian citizen and have a good background, high integrity, accountability, and commitment, and strongly passion towards working with the poor and social mission;
- Have at least Bachelor degree in Rural Development, Management, Economics, or related fields;
- Have at least 5 years’ experience in socio-economic services, preferably in micro finance industry; and/ or in rural development.
- Have a good interpersonal and communication skills, team work, independent, and result-oriented;
- Be good at basic computer skills i.e. MS Office…;
- Be high proficiency in English: listening, speaking, reading, and writing; and
- Have ability to handle multiple tasks and complexities and effective team management as per number of different projects will be implemented at the same time.
** BENEFITS AND REMUNERATION

Chamroeun offers candidate a competitive salary based on competency, experiences, and scope of work. We also provide annual salary increase based on annual performance and inflation, 13th and 14th month salary for Khmer New Year and Pchum Ben, healthcare program, 24-hour life & accident insurance, uniforms, communication allowance, and other benefits.

** Interested applicants meeting the above requirements may submit cover letter and CV with current photo not older than 6 months to all Chamroeun’s offices or head office located at #425, Street 271, Sangkat Toul Tumpoung II, Khan Chamkar Morn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia or via email: job@chamroeun.com

Chamroeun is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified women and disabled people are strongly encouraged to apply, and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview. The candidate’s application will not be returned.
** Closing date : 16 January 2015
,1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”
2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”
3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY:

Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.
■ QUALITY OF SERVICES:
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.
■ TRANSPARENCY:

At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.
■ FAIR PRACTICES:

At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.
■ CONFIDENTIALITY:
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.
■ NON-DISCRIMINATION:

Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.",Publish Date：Dec-16-2014,Closing Date：Jan-14-2015,"Contact Information Mr. San Chanraksmey  087 255 551 / 070 28 75 75  No.425, St. 271, Sangkat Tour Tom Pong II, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  087 255 551 / 070 28 75 75 "

Master Degree

Phnom Penh
","Company Profile:

Our client is divided into 3 groups, Retail and Distribution, Solution, and Property development. We are seeking dynamic and dedicated candidates to join our teams of professionals in the position of Chief Administrative Office (CAO).
Responsibilities:
- Act as the face of HR for the Group
- Responsible for senior level decision making and both day to day management and strategic direction of the group

- Develop and implement an annual agenda for HR strategy in line with the business plan. Ensure HR plans support the needs of the business but are also flexible enough to cope with changes in the organization, as and when they occur
- Provide information and reports on data such as staff turnover, references, cost per hire, training hours per person, etc.
- Conduct training needs analysis and designs and implement a training plan
- Ensure all staff receive appraisals in accordance with company policy
- Co-ordinate recruitment throughout the company through management of a recruitment team/HR team.
- Ensure all Job Descriptions are kept up to date, create new JDs as and when necessary
- Provide day to day advice to line managers on all human resource issues: management of staff, remuneration, etc.
- Maintain a succession plan for all departments
- Implement HR best practice and strategy within the organization and lead a HR team and Admin team
- Develops and maintains a human resources system that meets top management information needs.

- Identifies legal requirements and government reporting regulations affecting human resources functions and ensures policies, procedures, and reporting are in compliance. Studies legislation, arbitration decisions, and collective bargaining contracts to assess industry trends.
Requirements:
- At least 10+ years’ experience in senior operation management position of  related field
- Can quickly establish credibility and respect and build strong working relationships with department managers. Demonstrable maturity, professionalism and gravitas
- Ability to build from scratch as well as modify and set up new system
- Extensive leadership capacity, detail-oriented, and highly analytic nature

- Demonstrate an understanding of personalities and behavioral styles in order to work collaboratively with a variety of people and to make informed decision around resourcing, reporting structures and relationships
- Strong working knowledge of employment law issues and the ability to apply these to a variety of situations using a pragmatic and common sense approach
- Demonstrates passion - approaches all tasks in an enthusiastic way. Committed to upholding professional standards
- Self-motivated and self-aware - recognizes own strengths and weaknesses and is committed to personal development
- Takes a broad interest in the success and development of the company and the Human Resource function as a whole
- Exceptional interpersonal, team management and communication skills
Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Saturday
- Holidays: Sunday & Holidays
- Bonus: Annual Leave, Public Holidays, Miscellaneous allowance
- Salary : Negotiable","How to apply:
Interested candidates can send their CVs and Cover Letters with current photo of 4x6 to the email as posting below (Contact Information).
Note: Your attached files must be less than 3 MB.
First come, first serve!
Only short-list candidates will be contacted for an interview.
